item.title: How to get startup ideas?
item.description:
How to get startup ideas?

The way to get startup ideas is not to try to think of startup ideas. It's to look for problems, preferably problems you have yourself. The very best startup ideas tend to have three things in common: they're something the founders themselves want, that they themselves can build, and that few others realize are worth doing. Microsoft, Apple, Yahoo, Google, and Facebook all began this way.

item.title: Featured Design & Strategy Work
item.description:
Featured Design & Strategy Work

frog is a global design and strategy firm. We transform businesses at scale by creating systems of brand, product and service that deliver a distinctly better experience.

item.title: Growth Strategy
item.description:
Growth Strategy

frog partners with clients to identify, prioritize, and select new products and business opportunities. We find these opportunities through deep studies of user behaviors and needs, and green-field market sizing. We help clients act on these opportunities through financial validation and modeling.

item.title: frog
item.description:
frog

In this collection, we explore personal transportation and the new relationships forming between the digital and physical worlds as infrastructure, services, vehicles, and people connect in new ways.

item.title: Product and Service Design
item.description:
Product and Service Design

Our offerings support the blurring between digital and physical products. To create experiences that scale frog provides brand design as well as design systems services. Our history, footprint and experience spans sectors, from consumer goods to highly-regulated industries.

item.title: Tools
item.description:
Tools

On-the-ground work allows our teams and clients to develop a deep cultural and contextual understanding. frogImmersive embeds our research team alongside our clients and their stakeholders in the context of a culture, community, or market. To build bridges into these communities we work with local teams that ensure we gather the most meaningful and actionable insights for our clients.

item.title: B2G sales: How to sell to governments
item.description:
B2G sales: How to sell to governments

SeamlessDocs didn't set out to revolutionize the way governments digitally process forms. The startup-whose software instantly converts PDF or Word docs into dynamic, smart, cloud-based forms-wasn't even thinking about the government. They began like many other startups-with a vision, a couple of people, and a rough product.
